exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat c, h, l : pos n Hch : c <> h Hcl : c <> l Hhl : h <> l p, q : nat decoder_error := PUSH c Zero :: POP c q q :: nil : list (bsm_instr n) i : nat ln : list nat lc : list bool lt : list (list bool * list bool) v : vec (list bool) n H1 : v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc H2 : Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln k : nat H3 : lc = list_repeat Zero (S k) Unable to unify "lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)" with "list_nat_bool ln ++ lc = list_repeat Zero (S ?k)".

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
l: pos n
h: pos n
c: pos n
Hch: c <> h
Hcl: c <> l
Hhl: h <> l
q: nat
p: nat
decoder_error: list (bsm_instr n)
i: nat
ln: list nat
lc: list bool
lt: list (list bool * list bool)
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : Vector.t (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder i lt) // (i, v) ->> (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)

Premises:
Forall : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
list_repeat : forall X : Type, X -> nat -> list X
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive bsm_instr (n : nat) : Set := bsm_pop : pos n -> nat -> nat -> bsm_instr n | bsm_push : pos n -> bool -> bsm_instr n Arguments bsm_instr _%nat_scope Arguments bsm_pop [n]%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bsm_push [n]%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
Exists : forall A : Type, (A -> Prop) -> list A -> Prop
full_decoder = fun (i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) => POP c (4 + i) p :: PUSH c One :: PUSH h Zero :: POP h (5 + i) q :: PUSH c Zero :: decoder i (5 + i) ll : nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments full_decoder _%nat_scope _%list_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
Notation Zero := false
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
list_nat_bool = fix list_nat_bool (ln : list nat) : list bool := match ln with | nil => nil | x :: ll => list_repeat Zero x ++ One :: list_nat_bool ll end : list nat -> list bool Arguments list_nat_bool _%list_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 
full_dec_spec_rec1 : forall (i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) lt (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall (i k : nat) lt (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
list_bool_invalid = fun (k : nat) (lb : list bool) (ln : list nat) => exists lc : list bool, lb = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc /\ (Exists (fun x : nat => k <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln /\ (exists p : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S p))) : nat -> list bool -> list nat -> Prop Arguments list_bool_invalid _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
compare_stack_neq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x <> v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
cs_spec_rec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (l m : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
compare_stack_eq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
compare_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), exists (j : nat) (w : vec (list bool) n), (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (j, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z /\ (v#>x = v#>y /\ j = p \/ v#>x <> v#>y /\ j = q))
pos_S_inv : forall p0 : pos (S ?n), (p0 = pos0) + {q0 : pos ?n | p0 = pos_nxt q0} where ?n : [n : nat c : pos n h : pos n l : pos n Hch : c <> h Hcl : c <> l Hhl : h <> l p : nat q : nat decoder_error := PUSH c Zero :: POP c q q :: nil : list (bsm_instr n) i : nat ln : list nat lc : list bool lt : list (list bool * list bool) v : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
tiles_solvable = fun lt0 => exists ln : list nat, ln <> nil /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt0) ln /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt0 in hh = ll) : list (list bool * list bool) -> Prop Arguments tiles_solvable _%list_scope
full_dec_spec_rec : forall (i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) lt0 (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt0) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt0 in (i, full_decoder i lt0) // (i, v) -> > (i, v[lc/c][(hh ++ v#>h)/h][(ll ++ v#>l)/l])
list_bool_decomp : forall (k : nat) (lb : list bool), {ln : list nat & {lc : list bool | lb = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc /\ Exists (fun x : nat => k <= x) ln}} + {ln : list nat & {r : nat | lb = list_nat_bool ln ++ list_repeat Zero r /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln}}
full_decoder_ok_spec : forall (i : nat) (ln : list nat) lt0 (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_nat_bool ln -> v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt0) ln -> let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt0 in (i, full_decoder i lt0) // (i, v) -> > (p, v[nil/c][hh/h][ll/l])
list_bool_valid = fun (k : nat) (lb : list bool) (ln : list nat) => lb = list_nat_bool ln /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < k) ln : nat -> list bool -> list nat -> Prop Arguments list_bool_valid _%nat_scope (_ _)%list_scope
decoder_spec_nok_2 : forall (s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>c = list_repeat Zero k ++ lc -> length ll <= k -> exists r : nat, (i, decoder s i ll) // (i, v) -> > (q, v[(list_repeat Zero r ++ lc)/c])
decoder = fix decoder (s i : nat) lt {struct lt} : list (bsm_instr n) := match lt with | nil => decoder_error | (th, tl) :: lt0 => POP c (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) q :: tile h l th tl ++ PUSH c Zero :: POP c s s :: decoder s (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) lt0 end : nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments decoder (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
full_dec_start_spec_1 : forall (i : nat) lt (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>c <> nil -> (i, full_decoder i lt) // (i, v) -> > (5 + i, v)
transfer_ones_spec_1 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (b : bool) (k : nat) (l : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> st = (p, v[l/x][(list_repeat b k ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, transfer_ones x y i p q b) // (i, v) -> > st
decoder_spec_rec : forall (s i : nat) (mm ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (w : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> mm = ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr -> w = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder s i mm) // (i, v) -> > w
transfer_ones_spec_2 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (b : bool) (k : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>x = list_repeat One k -> st = (q, v[nil/x][(list_repeat b k ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, transfer_ones x y i p q b) // (i, v) -> > st
increment_spec_1 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat) (l : list bool), v#>x = list_repeat One k ++ Zero :: l -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero k ++ One :: l)/x])
decoder_spec_ok : forall (s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> st = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder s i (ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr)) // (i, v) -> > st
decoder_spec_nok_1 : forall (s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>c = list_repeat Zero k -> exists r : nat, (i, decoder s i ll) // (i, v) -> > (q, v[(list_repeat Zero r)/c])
increment_spec_2 : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (k : nat), v#>x = list_repeat One k -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[(list_repeat Zero (S k))/x])
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
tile_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (high low : list bool) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), st = (length (tile x y high low) + i, v[(high ++ v#>x)/x][(low ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, tile x y high low) // (i, v) -> > st
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}

```coq
intros H1 [H2 | [H2 [k H3]]].
- eapply full_dec_spec_rec1. apply H1. apply H2.
- eapply full_dec_spec_rec2. rewrite H1. apply H3.
```

original: intros H1 [H2 | [H2 [k H3]]]. - eapply full_dec_spec_rec1. apply H1. apply H2. - eapply full_dec_spec_rec2. rewrite H1. apply H3.
